item.title: Turn Based Rpg in Unity
item.description: This is a short demo for a turn based rpg combat in Unity. It’s heavily inspired by the Pokemon Games. Tools used: Unity Repository: https://github.com/Ukarus/UnityExamples/tree/main/TurnBasedRpg

item.title: The Grass is always Greener on the other Side
item.description: This is a simulation game about competing for a contest for the most beautiful garden, in which you must vandalize your neighbours garden’s and repair your house while also avoiding cameras and dogs when attacking. It was made in collaboration with David094 and GrafEisenn and it was a submission for the Github Game Off 2022. Tools used: Godot 3.5.1 Repository: https://github.com/Ukarus/GrassIsAlwaysGreenerOnTheOtherSide.git Visit the Itch.io page.

item.title: Ufo Invaders
item.description: Ufo invaders was a game i made for the CS50’s Introduction to Game Development course and it’s heavily inspired by Space Invaders. This game was my first attempt at Unity and it was a bit of a challenge at that time. It features a score mechanic, powerups, an infinite scrolling background and a score mechanic. Visit the Itch.io page!

item.title: Cowboy 50
item.description: Cowboy 50 is a game i made as a final project for the CS50 course. It’s a basic shoot’em up that includes powerups, spawning enemies, sounds, music and a basic gameplay. It’s a small clone of the mini game Journey of the Prairie King which can be played in Stardew Valley. Tools used. Love2D Visit the Itch.io page!

item.title: Boxes n' Barrels
item.description: Boxes and barrels was a game made in collaboration with kameronbsmiley, HumdrumParrot, ncollie and Ukarus (me). It was a submission for the Godot Wild Jam No 47. This is a puzzle game with a third person camera, it’s heavily inspired by the Sokoban games. Visit the Itch.io page!

item.title: Rage and Snow
item.description: Rage and snow was the first game i did outside of a tutorial and the first one i made with a team, so it has a special place in my heart despite all it’s bugs and flaws. It was made for the “Open Jam 2018” and the theme for that jam was “Spam to win” so it’s a mix of platformer with a snowball spam mechanic. Visit the Itch.io website!
